author: ramankhurana
body:
This PR has multiple (minor) changes or fixes in the JME DQM s/w. The slides were presented in JME-DPG few weeks ago. it will be good for 2018 data taking. https://indico.cern.ch/event/697045/contributions/2863770/attachments/1586988/2509637/JME-DQM-ReReco2018.pdf

The previous PR #22167 always failed at the runTheMatrix checks. This PR is checked and tested. I will delete that PR.
title: For2018 data taking
